snippet: Peter Schlesinger — who captured Swinging London at its golden peak — on his new book, old friends and domestic pleasures.
abstract: Photographer Peter Schlesinger reflects upon his early life in bohemian London and New York in latest book Peter Schlesinger: Photographic Memory 1968-1989.
lead_paragraph: Peter Schlesinger — who captured Swinging London at its golden peak — on his new book, old friends and domestic pleasures.

headline.main: Intimate Pictures From a Legendary Photographer
